<<<<<<< HEAD
An answer to Dr. Sherlock's Preservative against Popery shewing that Protestancy cannot be defended nor Catholic faith opposed, but by principles which make void all reason, faith, fathers, councils, Scripture, moral honesty. Sabran, Lewis, 1652-1732.
8 p.
Printed by Henry Hills, London : 1688.
"Published with allowance." Attributed to Lewis Sabran--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
